name: Mutify
body:
I like [Spotify](http://www.spotify.com). I don't like ads.

I know, I could (and perhaps should) cough up for a premium subscription to get rid of the ads. I don't really use it enough to justify the expense, though. 

*Enter, Mutify...*

Mutify is a tiny program for Mac OS X that sits in the background listening for track-change notifications from Spotify. It uses some simple rules to figure out whether the current track is an ad, and if it is, it mutes Spotify. 


### Installation

Download [the installer](https://github.com/sijk/mutify-osx/raw/master/dist/Mutify.pkg). Double click it. 

Depending on your security settings, you may get a notice saying that the installer can't be opened because it's from an unidentified developer. If that happens, right-click on the installer and choose *Open*. 

Once the installer has finished, Mutify will be running in the background. It will launch automatically whenever you log in. 


### FAQ

-   **Will it slow down my computer?**
    No. Mutify uses [distributed notifications][1], which means that Spotify tells 
    it when tracks change; it doesn't have to keep asking. This makes it very 
    efficient. It also only uses a few megabytes of RAM. 

-   **Does it detect all ads?**
    Yes, as far as I know. I can't guarantee that it will, but I can 
    say that I haven't heard an ad since I wrote this program. 

-   **It didn't mute an ad!**
    Right-click on the album art panel in the bottom left corner of the window 
    and choose *Copy Spotify URI* while the ad is playing. 
    Open a bug report [here](http://github.com/sijk/mutify-osx/issues/new) and 
    paste in the URI of the ad that wasn't muted. 

-   **But I use Linux.**
    Cool, me too. Check out http://sijk.github.com/mutify-linux.

-   **But I use Windows.**
    I don't. Sorry.

-   **How do I uninstall it?**
    You really want to uninstall Mutify? :cry:
    Open Terminal.app and type in the following lines.

        launchctl unload com.github.sijk.Mutify
        rm ~/Library/LaunchAgents/com.github.sijk.Mutify.plist
        sudo rm /usr/local/bin/Mutify
        sudo pkgutil --forget com.github.sijk.pkg.Mutify

[1]: http://developer.apple.com/library/mac/#documentation/Cocoa/Reference/Foundation/Classes/NSDistributedNotificationCenter_Class/Reference/Reference.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40003653
